metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6927 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The futex_requeue function in kernel/futex.c in the Linux kernel before4.14.15 might allow attackers to cause a denial of service (integeroverflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact by triggering anegative wake or requeue value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6927` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-153-generic - 3.13.0-153.203
linux-image-3.13.0-153-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-153.203
linux-image-3.13.0-153-lowlatency - 3.13.0-153.203
linux-image-3.13.0-153-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-153.203
linux-image-3.13.0-153-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-153.203
linux-image-3.13.0-153-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-153.203
linux-image-3.13.0-153-powerpc64-emb - 3.13.0-153.203
linux-image-3.13.0-153-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-153.203
linux-image-extra-3.13.0-153-generic - 3.13.0-153.203
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-119-generic - 4.4.0-119.143~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-119-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-119.143~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-119-lowlatency - 4.4.0-119.143~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-119-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-119.143~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-119-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-119.143~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-119-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-119.143~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-119-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-119.143~14.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-119-generic - 4.4.0-119.143~14.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1016-aws - 4.4.0-1016.16
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13.0-153.203').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
